translations: v.朝向，面对，使适合；定向放置（某物）；使熟悉，帮助适应（orient 的过去式和过去分词）

phrs.translation: 面向对象的；对象趋向的；物件导向的
面向用户的；使用者导向的

sentences.sentence: Our whole programme is spiritually oriented but not religious.
sentences.translation: 我们的整个节目以精神而不是宗教为导向。

sentences.sentence: It seems almost inevitable that North African economies will still be primarily oriented toward Europe.
sentences.translation: 看来可以预见的是，北非经济仍会主要面向欧洲。

sentences.sentence: Siri, as some have already described, is an action-oriented search too.
sentences.translation: 有人把 Siri 描述成一个行动导向型搜索工具。
